text:
PassFort | Full-Stack Engineers | London | Onsite Full-Time £50-£80k depending on experience + equity

At PassFort, our vision is to solve trust in the digital economy, starting with regulated businesses.

We work with an awesome stack - Javascript (ES6), React, Redux front end; Python, Rust back end; microservice based architecture built on top of Kubernetes and Google’s Cloud Platform. We're open to you focussing front or back end, so long as you're open to a working knowledge of both.

Team - We're 12 people strong, have solid funding behind us, and looking to double over the next year.

Values - Trust, Empowerment, Growth!

You can see more detail here - https://www.workable.com/j/F873F5B932
